availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Pennsylvania native. Son of Isaac Smith and Hannah Smith. Married to Mary Ann Huffman Smith in Pendleton County, Kentucky, in 1844. Father of Isabell Smith, Theodore Smith, Margaret Ellen Smith, Silvester Smith, Nancy L. Smith, David A. Smith, Mary A. Smith, Samuel H. Smith, and John W. Smith. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1850. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District No. 1, p. 390A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 661.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct No. 3, p. 423A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994052, Pendleton County Deaths.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000272800.
"David Smith (1807-1876)," Find A Grave, Memorial #178611944, Accessed July 11, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/178611944.
